name: HiOperator
headline: Customer support as a service.
description: HiOperator provides customer support as a service. Banish your ticket backlog and free up your in-house team for higher level tasks.
generated_description:
HiOperator is a customer support as a service company based in San Francisco, part of the illustrious Y Combinator Batch S16. Founded with a mission to eliminate ticket backlogs, HiOperator empowers in-house teams to focus on higher-level tasks while ensuring efficient and effective customer service.

With a growing team of around 200 employees, HiOperator leverages powerful technology to enhance customer support operations through a variety of automated tools—most notably HiLite, HiAuto, Elite Agent, and SMSbot. These tools are designed to streamline, personalize, and elevate the customer experience, helping clients manage their support efficiently. Features include auto-tagging of customer interactions, quick and automated responses, and even direct SMS support.

What sets HiOperator apart is its flexible and scalable solutions. Companies can integrate HiOperator’s services seamlessly into existing workflows without the need for complicated APIs, and they can choose from flexible contracts based on their needs, whether it’s for overflow assistance or comprehensive support coverage.

The company employs a unique pay-per-resolution pricing model, ensuring that clients only pay for the conversations they solve—no hidden fees or onboarding costs. This approach aligns incentives between HiOperator and its clients, fostering a collaborative atmosphere focused on success.

HiOperator serves a diverse range of industries including retail, media, travel, and health tech, drawing partnerships with notable brands like Shopify, Topgolf, and eBay. Their approach not only aims to solve immediate customer service pain points but also to create a data-driven feedback loop to continuously improve service quality.

For businesses looking to elevate their customer support, HiOperator promises a rapid onboarding process, and their tech-driven solutions can turn customer service challenges into streamlined operations. If you’re intrigued, you can learn more at [hioperator.com](http://www.hioperator.com) or engage further with their offerings.
